tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She's excellent with the kids. Explains to the kid patiently of her treatment plan. As parents we are thoroughly satisfied with her suggestions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Instantaneous resolution to the dental problems . Expertise tretment. No much wait time. Friendly atmosphere.Good counselling

tags: None
review: She is very good and extremely patient with kids. Clinic is clean and hygienic.  Staff /helpers also clean and well groomed .. they are gentle to kids and dont look irritated incase my child cries.  Child friendly(toys /books etc are there) and spacious compared to a lot of other places I've tried.  Gives sufficient time and makes sure the child is comfortable with her and the treatment. No long waiting time. ****** ******** *** **** ********* ************* *** *** *****. Have been going to her for 6 years now. ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We managed to treat our 2 year olds cavity , followed by a flouride treatment.  
It was super challenging to treat such a young child who wouldn't sit to even show her teeth.  But Dr.Shilpa dealed with utmost patience and care.
She is a great doctor with experience . Highly recommended for kids with teeth problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I used to wonder why & how  a paediatric dentist is different from regular dentist. Meet Dr.Shilpa Naik and you will know. My 5 year old now runs to the dentist chair and sits with his mouth open. I was amazed. She also shares a lot of insights on overall kid’s  health. There can also be speech development implications, depending on which milk tooth falls off. Never knew. Highly recommend Dr. Shilpa Naik.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Siddharth 

Extremely professional and warm 
Explains the issue well 
Takes the patient into confidence 
Has a good hand while doing the treatment 
Values time and cost for patient
His staff is friendly and helpful 
Music and ambience make it an effortless experience
Highly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been regularly visiting Dr Shilpa for dental checkup. She understands children and their psychology very well. My daughter had fear of going to Doctors, specially dentists. However, after visiting Dr Shilpa, her fear has completely vanished. We got feeling in five teeth of my daughter,  which was done very efficiently. I will recommend Dr Shilpa for your lovely kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor was in the clinic at the appointed time and  immediately without any delay examined the teeth and advised the treatment to be given. The cleaning procedure started immediately after that and was completed within 30 minutes. The doctor also advised the care to be taken for maintenance of the teeth thru proper brushing techniques. The entire process took half hour only.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi Mr Naik was Very excellent in his work I went for My teeth root canal & cap treatment.still it's under process but in first visit the way of Handling to patients was feeling very friendly.
By the cleaning part of teeth he was talking to patients and understanding how the process of teeth cleaning is happening is any pain you are getting.so mentally he makes patients feel very relax during the treatment.
Still my filling & cap treatment is pending but I have got the appointment next week.
Definitely will recommend to others.

Regards
Paresh Dalvi

tags: None
review: Excellent. Understands kids really well. Adjusts with timings according to child's schedule. Has always been available on phone in case of emergency and if needed gives appointment imdtly .  Very patient with kids.not in a hurry to finish her job. My kids totally love her. And extremely hygienic  and clean clinic and staff.

review: It was my second visit.. first I had with husband of Dr. Shilpa Naik and second for my daughter with Dr. Shilpa Naik. Both doctors are good and made us understand the issue and treated it effectively.
